title: Number of earthquakes , by country 1900 to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 12 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of earthquakes 157.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Afghanistan where Country is 32.0.
The difference of Number of earthquakes between the highest and lowest Country is 125.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 12 number of Countrys.
The Number of earthquakes is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Afghanistan.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 12 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of earthquakes 157.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Afghanistan where Country is 32.0.
The difference of Number of earthquakes between the highest and lowest Country is 125.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of earthquakes in the y axis.
The Number of earthquakes is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Afghanistan.
There is a difference of 125.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Afghanistan.
Number of earthquakes at Country China is 157.0 , second place is Indonesia at 113.0, and thirdly is Iran (Islamic Republic of) at 106.0.
Country Afghanistan, India, Greece, and Mexico share the same value 32.0.
The Country Afghanistan tends to be 2.48 percent lower than average.
The Number of earthquakes is 760.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
